sentences.english: The larvae feed on the tender leaves and cause injury to Mahonia leveileana shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲取食嫩葉，對闊葉十大功勞造成嚴重損害。

sentences.english: A variety of conifers and hardwoods makes up the bulk of the vegetation .
sentences.chinese: 大部分植被由各種針葉樹類和闊葉樹類構成。

sentences.english: The hoolock gibbon mainly distributes in the mid-mountain humid evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 它們主要分佈在中山溼性常綠闊葉林。

sentences.english: Annual broadleaf and grass weeds are major problems .
sentences.chinese: 主要問題是一年生闊葉雜草和禾本科雜草。

sentences.english: Aphrodisium faldermannii rufiventris Gressitt is an important pest of broadleaf trees.
sentences.chinese: 紅腹柄天牛是闊葉樹的重要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: Castanopsis hystrix is one of the important planting tree species of south subtropical evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 紅錐是南亞熱帶地區優良的珍貴鄉土闊葉造林樹種。

sentences.english: Castanopsis eyrei forest was one of the main forest types in Gutianshan Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 甜櫧林是古田山自然保護區常綠闊葉林主要類型之一。

sentences.english: Betulacostata trautv, a kind of hardwoods, is one of use of higher-value in our country nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 楓樺是當前我國利用價值較高的硬闊葉樹材之一。

sentences.english: The average DBH of new bamboo increased with the increasing distance from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 隨距闊葉樹基幹距離的增加，新竹平均胸徑迅速增加。

sentences.english: The results indicated that the average water consumption rate of broadleaf trees was more than conifer trees.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，針葉樹種耗水速率低於闊葉樹種。

sentences.english: The growth state and distribution features of these evergreen plants are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了常綠闊葉木本植物的生長狀況和分佈特點。

sentences.english: It grows in broad-leaved forests in late spring and early summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年春末夏初生於闊葉林中。

sentences.english: The hardwoods are trees with broad leaves.
Britain's weather is the oceanity temperate zone foliage forest climate, all year long temperate moist.
sentences.chinese: 英國的天氣屬海洋性溫帶闊葉林氣候，終年溫和溼潤。

sentences.english: Annual broadleaf and grass weeds are major problems.
sentences.chinese: 主要問題是一年生闊葉雜草和禾本科雜草。

sentences.english: The northeastern United States coast is a continental climate temperate forest.
sentences.chinese: 美國東北部沿海屬大陸性溫帶闊葉林氣候。
